```{r echo = FALSE}
## timeline data, add row for each task/event
timeline_data <- readr::read_csv("timeline.csv") %>% 
  rename(content = task)

## design and embed timeline widget
timeline_widget <- timevis(timeline_data) %>% 
  centerItem(nrow(timeline_data))
frameWidget(timeline_widget, width = "100%", height = "800")
```
